definition: separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: Wu said he was glad to meet Prime Minister Putin again.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，很高興時隔不久再次見到總理先生。

sentences.english: Ten months on he trimmed four full seconds from his time.
sentences.chinese: 時隔十個月，他的成績整整縮短了四秒。

sentences.english: This is the second state visit to France by President Hu Jintao in the six years.
sentences.chinese: 這是時隔6年多後，胡錦濤再次對法國進行國事訪問。

sentences.english: We are in same city now, after 8 years.
sentences.chinese: 時隔8年阿拉又在同一個城市相遇。

sentences.english: The incident comes less than a year after a similar outage brought a halt to communications between Europe, Africa and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 此次事件距上次歐亞非通訊中斷時隔不到一年。

sentences.english: Fast forward to today, Evie is nearing two, and things are a little different.
sentences.chinese: 時隔至今，Evie快2歲了，情況也有點不同了。

sentences.english: It feel strange to is visiting the place again after all these year.
sentences.chinese: 時隔多年，舊地重訪使人感到很新奇。

sentences.english: Old Liu is threatened, fear of reprisals, the first time in a long time dare to the police.
sentences.chinese: 老劉受到威脅，害怕遭到報復，時隔許久纔敢報警。

sentences.english: It may have taken six years, but Robertson's company is finally back on the map.
sentences.chinese: 雖然時隔6年，但羅伯遜的公司終於熬出了頭。

sentences.english: But it was no long time that HuNan satellite TV fell into a serious loss.
sentences.chinese: 但是時隔不久，湖南衛視便陷入了嚴重虧損之中。

sentences.english: I can't believe after so many years later, what comes around goes around.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到時隔多年，對這位老先生的取笑卻反咬我一口。

sentences.english: President Hu paid a state visit to France last time 6 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這是時隔6年多後，胡錦濤再次對法國進行國事訪問。

sentences.english: Is The Big Bang Theory the new Friends?
sentences.chinese: 時隔多年，一部新的輕喜劇《生活大爆炸》推出了。

sentences.english: It feels strange to BE visiting the place again after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 時隔多年，舊地重訪使人感到很新奇。

sentences.english: It was the first bird flu epidemic to hit Japan in 79 years, officials said.
sentences.chinese: 官員們宣稱，這是日本地區時隔七十九年後，首度發。
